overview:
Richard J. Surratt is Executive Vice President, Finance and Chief Financial Officer.

Richard succeeds Sean R. Creamer, who was promoted in June 2010 to Executive Vice President, U.S. Media Services, responsible for the Company’s radio and cross-platform services and operations.

From 2007 to 2009, Richard was President and Chief Executive Officer at Voyager Learning Company (OTC: VLCY), a K-12 education software company. Richard joined Voyager Learning in 2005 as Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer.

From 1999 to 2005, he worked as Executive Vice President, Chief Financial Officer and Treasurer at Atlantic Coast Airlines Holdings, Inc., a publicly traded company that operated the regional airline Independence Air.

From 1991 to 1999, Richard held a number of finance positions at Mobil Corporation including Director, Mergers and Acquisitions Group; Treasurer, Latin America; Senior Associate â€“ Global Capital Markets; and Senior Financial Analyst.
